thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com
thread.title: Julien Kos

author: Julien Kos
title: Julien Kos
text: Everytime I call GoDaddy, I always speak to people who are ready and able to help me on my issues. I almost never get the runaround with GoDaddy (where people just transfer you non-stop lol) so that makes me very happy. Most of their employees really seem to be on the ball and smart. I don't ever need to re-explain my issue twice, because they already understand before I finish explaining.
